title: Gurdwara Mata Sunder Kaur
text: Gurdwara Mata Sunder Kaur is historical site visited by <a href="Mata%20Sundari">Mata Sundari</a>, <a href="Baba%20Deep%20Singh">Baba Deep Singh</a> and <a href="Bhai%20Mani%20Singh">Bhai Mani Singh</a> while his trip to <a href="Delhi">Delhi</a> after evacuation of <a href="Guru%20Gobind%20Singh">Guru Gobind Singh</a>, his family and <a href="Khalsa">Khalsa</a> Army from <a href="Anandpur%20Sahib">Anandpur Sahib</a>. The Gurdwara is located in <a href="Sector%2070%2C%20Mohali">Sector 70, Mohali</a>, <a href="Punjab%2C%20India">Punjab</a>. The Gurdwara is controlled by <a href="Budha%20Dal">Budha Dal</a> Nihang Sikhs.
